problem_data.brief_description: include an integer value in a message
problem_data.description:
Add a printf statement to the program so that it prints a message of the following form: 

It goes to N

In place of N, the program should print the value stored in the variable called volume. So, for example, if volume contains the value 11, then the message should be 

It goes to 11

Don't change any of the existing code: just add a printf statement where indicated.
